description: Describes an Amazon Forecast dataset created using the CreateDataset operation. In addition to listing the parameters specified in the CreateDataset request, this operation includes the following dataset properties:

parameters.name: DatasetArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset.

nested_items.name: DatasetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset.

nested_items.name: Domain
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the dataset.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: An array of attributes specifying the name and type of each field in a dataset.

nested_items.name: AttributeName
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset field.

nested_items.name: AttributeType
nested_items.description: The data type of the field.

nested_items.name: EncryptionConfig
nested_items.description: The Key Management Service (KMS) key and the Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that Amazon Forecast can assume to access the key.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that Amazon Forecast can assume to access the KMS key.

nested_items.name: KMSKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the KMS key.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the dataset. States include:

nested_items.name: LastModificationTime
nested_items.description: When you create a dataset, LastModificationTime is the same as CreationTime. While data is being imported to the dataset, LastModificationTime is the current time of the DescribeDataset call. After a CreateDatasetImportJob operation has finished, LastModificationTime is when the import job completed or failed.
